content.html: "and being careful of not taking the piss." BS. You're paid by your employer to advance their mission. Growing yourself and your team only ever makes you better at that. Read books at your desk. Expense the fancy IDE, get a HR consult for the comfy chair.
content.value:
"and being careful of not taking the piss."

BS.

You're paid by your employer to advance their mission.

Growing yourself and your team only ever makes you better at that.

Read books at your desk. Expense the fancy IDE, get a HR consult for the comfy chair.
